message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it for $180?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I understand you're looking to save a bit of money, but I've got to make a profit. I can do $160, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $155, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $155 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
